price: 40. Il aura certes, auprès de Nous, une place rapprochée et un heureux retour.
arabic: وَإِنَّ لَهُۥ عِندَنَا لَزُلۡفَىٰ وَحُسۡنَ مَـَٔابٖ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wa-inna lahu ʿindanā lazul'fā waḥus'na maābin
